com.microblink.uisettings.options

Interface ScanInstructionsUIOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlinkCardUISettings, DocumentVerificationUISettings

    public interface ScanInstructionsUIOptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFirstSideInstructions()
      Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
      int getFirstSideInstructionsResourceID()
      Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
      java.lang.String getSecondSideInstructions()
      Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.
      int getSecondSideInstructionsResourceID()
      Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.
      void setFirstSideInstructions(java.lang.String firstSideInstructions)
      Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
      void setFirstSideInstructionsResourceID(int firstSideInstructionsResourceID)
      Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
      void setSecondSideInstructions(java.lang.String secondSideInstructions)
      Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.
      void setSecondSideInstructionsResourceID(int secondSideInstructionsResourceID)
      Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstSideInstructionsResourceID

        @StringRes
int getFirstSideInstructionsResourceID()
        Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
        Returns:
        first side instructions string resource ID

      • setFirstSideInstructionsResourceID

        void setFirstSideInstructionsResourceID(@StringRes
                                        int firstSideInstructionsResourceID)
        Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
        Parameters:
        firstSideInstructionsResourceID - first side instructions string resource ID

      • getFirstSideInstructions

        @Nullable
java.lang.String getFirstSideInstructions()
        Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned.
        Returns:
        first side instructions string or null if instructions do not exist

      • setFirstSideInstructions

        void setFirstSideInstructions(@NonNull
                              java.lang.String firstSideInstructions)
        Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned. Please prefer to use ScanInstructionsUIOptions.setFirstSideInstructionsResourceID(int). If both methods were called, instructions that were set as string resource will be taken.
        Parameters:
        firstSideInstructions - first side instructions string

      • getSecondSideInstructionsResourceID

        @StringRes
int getSecondSideInstructionsResourceID()
        Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.
        Returns:
        second side instructions string resource ID

      • setSecondSideInstructionsResourceID

        void setSecondSideInstructionsResourceID(@StringRes
                                         int secondSideInstructionsResourceID)
        Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.
        Parameters:
        secondSideInstructionsResourceID - second side instructions string resource ID

      • getSecondSideInstructions

        @Nullable
java.lang.String getSecondSideInstructions()
        Returns user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned.
        Returns:
        second side instructions string or null if instructions do not exist

      • setSecondSideInstructions

        void setSecondSideInstructions(@NonNull
                               java.lang.String secondSideInstructions)
        Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the second side of the document is being scanned. Please prefer to use ScanInstructionsUIOptions.setSecondSideInstructionsResourceID(int) If both methods were called, instructions that were set as string resource will be taken.
        Parameters:
        secondSideInstructions - second side instructions string
